Transcription:
a1 alyek allekä kca yolo-ere y(amal)ñ(e)ntasa (ñweṃ wast)s(i) p· – – – – – – – (–)
a2-b1 ywārc-m(e)ñaṣṣe naṣṣalñe parna plakimeṃ tu kätkanamanetse i(päṣṣeñca) omte se pla(ki) s(t)e ywārc meñe liprä ṣmāyana preściy(aṃts n)auṣ(u meñe ś)r(a)mṣ(ṣa)na (pre)ś(ciyaṃts ce)y wi śle ywā(rt)s(a) meñane emalyaṣṣa preś(c)iya yenteṣṣa (pre)ś(ci)ya swe(seṣṣa) preściy(a) – – (ṣ)ṣ(a) pr(e)ściya ytariṣṣa preśc(i)ya se o(mte p)l(a)ki – – – –
b1-2 (k_use n)o ṣamāne päknāmo lwasāṣṣ(ai) śconaine ykuweṣ onolme śaulameṃ – – – – – – –
b2-4 (k_use) no ṣamāne ṣamānetse päknāmo onmiṃ kalo(y) e – – – – – – – – (–) mäkte kca cwi ṣamānetse ṣekkāka rano (t)o(t) mā ayā(to) – – – – – – – (mā a)lye(k)

Translation:
a1 ... [without using] any of the makings of bad appearance, a new garment ...
a2-b1 Half-monthly bathing [is permitted], except for a [special] agreement. To the one who transgresses this [rule], Pātayantikā [arises]. In that respect, this is a [special]: Half [a month and] a month of the summer times [is] remaining; [or it is] the first month of the rain times (bad season). These two and a half months [are] the time of heat. [Further there are] the time of wind, the time of rain, the time of (deed), [and] the time of way [=travel]. This [is] the [special] agreement in that respect.
b1-2 The monk who intentionally ... from the life a being [living] in the [bad] condition of an animal ...
b2-4 The monk who intentionally raises remorse for [another] monk ... "In any way, this monk (may/will) have at least for a single moment an unpleasant feeling." ...

–Martin (Wed, 2015-08-19, 01:42:37 (CEST))
